abstract: Dwight Garner reviews book The Journals of Spalding Gray, edited by Nell Casey.
snippet: Nearly 40 years of self-absorbed musings and uneasy feelings written by a searching and troubled artist have been condensed into “The Journals of Spalding Gray.”
lead_paragraph: Nearly 40 years of self-absorbed musings and uneasy feelings written by a searching and troubled artist have been condensed into “The Journals of Spalding Gray.”

headline.main: Peering Beyond a Monologist’s Stage Presence Into His Uncensored Mind
headline.print_headline: Peering Beyond a Monologist’s Stage Presence Into His Uncensored Mind
headline.seo: ‘Journals of Spalding Gray,’ Edited by Nell Casey - Review
